articles.title: Optical manipulation of electronic dimensionality in a quantum material
articles.description: Two-dimensional electronic states are observed at the induced domain walls of a three-dimensional charge density wave material by manipulating the periodic lattice distortion via femtosecond infrared pulses.
articles.content:
